titleStmt.title: The case of sees vacant by an unjust or uncanonical deprivation, stated in reply to a treatise entituled A vindication of the deprived bishops, &c. : together with the several other pamphlets lately publish'd as answers to the Baroccian treatise / by Humphry Hody ...
titleStmt.author: Hody, Humphrey, 1659-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. for Henry Mortlock ...,

notesStmt.note: Preliminary pages, p. 1-15 photographed from Union Theological Seminary Library copy and inserted at end.
